title: Textile, "Length of Block Printed Linen", 1920–30
description: Polychrome block print on brick-red linen. Large central serpentine tree elaborately-patterned bark in grey, brown and yellow with green, blue and brown leaves elaborately patterned, with large fantastic flowers in blue, red and tan. In center is a yellow bird with red tail feathers and elegant blue crest. Pattern matches side to side in a one-half drop repeat. Condition: Soiled.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Length of Block Printed Linen", 1920–30.
1920–30. Medium: linen
Technique: block printed. Gift of Mrs. Germaine Little. 1968-110-34.
